result.name: geospatial-commission-data-catalogue-voa
result.notes:
Working with the Geospatial Commission, the Geo6 organisations have produced a simplified common data catalogue providing core information on the geospatial datasets that they hold and manage.  This catalogue or index of data is made available under OGL however, the underlying datasets may be available under different licences.

##Geographic Coverage

England and Wales

##Additional Resources

 * [BGS](http://data.bgs.ac.uk/gc/GC%20Data%20Catalogue%20-%20British%20Geological%20Survey.csv)

 * [CA](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/773529/GC_Data_Catalogue_-_Coal_Authority.csv)

 * [HMLR](https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/773484/GC_Data_Catalogue_-_HM_Land_Registry.csv)

 * [OS](https://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/xml/datasets/GCDataCatalogue-OrdnanceSurvey.csv)

 * [UKHO](https://www.admiralty.co.uk/inspiremetadata/GC%20Data%20Catalogue%20-%20United%20Kingdom%20Hydrographic%20Office.csv)

 * [VOA](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/773162/GC_Data_Catalogue_Valuation_Office_Agency.csv)

##Link to CSV column definitions

 * [Human Readable](https://github.com/OrdnanceSurvey/discoverability/wiki)

 * [JSON schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrdnanceSurvey/discoverability/master/GC-Data-Catalogue-csv-schema.json)

##Frequency of Update

Bi-annual or sooner, if required.

organization.name: valuation-office-agency
organization.title: Valuation Office Agency
organization.description:
The Valuation Office Agency (VOA) provides the government with the valuations and property advice required to support taxation and benefits. It compiles and maintains the business rating and council tax valuation lists for England and Wales, and delivers a range of valuation and surveying services to over 4,000 public sector bodies.

VOA is an executive agency of HM Revenue & Customs

http://www.voa.gov.uk/corporate/index.html

result.title: Geospatial Commission Data Catalogue: Valuation Office Agency
